newsitem.title: UK: SOCCER-HOWE RETURNS TO ARSENAL TO COACH YOUTH TEAM.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-HOWE RETURNS TO ARSENAL TO COACH YOUTH TEAM.

text.p: Don Howe is leaving the Football Association to rejoin Arsenal football club as head youth coach, the F.A. said on Friday.
"Arsenal have always been very close to my heart. Another chance to be involved in day to day football at Highbury is irresistible," Howe said in a statement.

The 59-year-old spent 17 years with Arsenal as player, coach and manager between 1964 and 1986. He has been the FA's technical coordinator for the last three years and will take up his new post on July 1.
